actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To amend the Residential Lead-Based Paint Hazard Reduction Act of 1992 to provide assistance for residential properties designated as Superfund sites.

summary.text: Amends the Residential Lead-Based Paint Hazard Reduction Act of 1992 to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to give priority, when awarding grants for lead-based paint hazard reduction under that Act, to residential properties included on the National Priorities List established by the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act.

titles.title: To amend the Residential Lead-Based Paint Hazard Reduction Act of 1992 to provide assistance for residential properties designated as Superfund sites.
